hero.title: Transform Your Art into Valuable Currency
hero.description: Convert your handmade masterpieces into digital gold. Each validated artwork becomes a secure, tradeable asset with guaranteed appreciation.

validation.title: Secure Validation
validation.description: Advanced AI and human verification ensure authenticity

growth.title: Value Growth
growth.description: The value of your art only increases through our community system
growth.description2: With a wealth distribution that encourages buy-sell

distribution.title: Fair Distribution
distribution.description: Transparent value sharing between creators and investors.
distribution.description2: The artist keeps a share of each artwork for life!

details.title: Post your drawings, subtitles or double our videos, and make all your content exchangeable crypto
details.exp1: In over 40 categories, post any style of creation and receive 40 Tabascoin as a bonus!
details.exp2: As a new artist, you have 12 slots (space for your masterpieces)
details.exp3: Your masterpieces will gain value in cryptocurrencies with every 100 likes!
details.exp4: And above all, they will gain value in buy-sell, knowing that you will always keep 10%! 10% of 1 million x12, how much is that?? Wow, wow!

financing.title: The Shop
financing.exp1: Choose your unique T-shirts and cryptos here
financing.exp2: This will finance our ethical and transparent projects with detailed costs and finances
financing.exp3: This will open a wallet for you that will be indexed to gold and silver within 3 years
financing.exp4: After 3 months of staking, each purchase participates between 20 and 80% in followed, sourced, reliable, clear humanitarian aid operations!

industries.title: The Manga Factory
industries.exp2: Win a community, collaborations, and cryptos
industries.exp3: Discover Shonen Dump and its creatives
industries.exp4: Bring out new talents and win with them!

introducing.catchphrase1: Tabascocity, born from the desert where we had nothing, the first anti-system bank created a paradise against the Terminators.
introducing.catchphrase2: The Tab-as-Coin is going to tabas the market!
introducing.title: It's serious, and we don't care about your pompous protocols!

market.ph2: Phase 2: Ethereum and Solana Exchange Listing
market.ph3: Phase 3: Gold and Silver Exchange Listing

fraud.title: Fraud Protection & Consequences
fraud.parag: Submitting fraudulent artworks (AI-generated, copies, or prints) will result in severe consequences:
fraud.exp1: Immediate forfeiture of all assets and investments
fraud.exp4: special punishement, some of your datas will be shared on the dark
fraud.exp5: By submitting artwork, you acknowledge these terms and accept full legal responsibility for authenticity.
